comment: /**  * Generates an unique ID of the mail message depending on if its POP3 or IMAP protocol.  *  * @param message the mail message  * @return the unique id, must never be <tt>null</tt>.  */
code: /**  * Generates an unique ID of the mail message depending on if its POP3 or IMAP protocol.  *  * @param message the mail message  * @return the unique id, must never be <tt>null</tt>.  */ String generateUuid(MailEndpoint mailEndpoint, Message message).
